text: pelnih a l laoh ban samreal champoh puok anak proh trong ban doeng tha puok anak mean pheap tnkhsaaoy . hetonih bae knongchamnaom puok anak mean chamnuon muoy ry neak del tsaou atthmot ku puok anak nung chhneah ( sa trauv) chamnuon pir ry neak haey bae knongchamnaom puok anak mean muoy pean neak ku puok anak nung chhneah chamnuon pir pean neak daoy meankar anounhnhat pi a l laoh . haey a l laoh pitchea now cheamuoy puok anak del tsaou atthmot
